name: Coco's Cove
description:
Meet Coco

Coco is a fun, energetic monkey living in a cove. Like any monkey, Coco likes to romp around the jungle near the cove to find adventures to fill its days.

You can help Coco fuel these adventures by stretching her tail back then releasing. That action flings Coco through the air to collect yummy food. Bananas are a definite favorite, but Coco also likes salmon, cake, and even french fries! Delicious!

We all have our challenges in life, and Coco is no different. Though you can't tell by looking, Coco happens to have type 2 diabetes. Eating the wrong foods (like too many carbs) or not eating at the right times can affect blood sugar. But, hey, no worries. That can be a bummer sometimes, but with practice, you can help Coco move along to the next world.

Coco lives a great life in the jungle. Help Coco explore the jungle, overcome many challenges, and…well…live that carefree jungle life that makes Coco happy!

5 Worlds

From Jolly Jungle to Rowdy Rapids, from Wacky Winds to Fauna Falls...and let's not forget Rocky Ruins. A monkey like Coco needs lots of space to roam.

Handcrafted Levels

All 100 levels are carefully crafted and made with our love for Coco--and to keep Coco's antics flying high!

Fun for All

This puzzle platformer was designed with a healthy dose of fun. Why? Because Coco insisted. And we aim to make Coco happy.

Beautiful Art

On top of fun, we piled on a ton of beautiful art (well, maybe a little less than an actual ton!) to make sure Coco lives in a home worthy of an energetic little monkey.
